name: lammps
description: LAMMPS molecular dynamics simulator compiled to WebAssembly

scripts.prebuild: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (fs.existsSync('dist')) fs.rmSync('dist', { recursive: true });"
scripts.build:ts: npm run prebuild && npm run copy-wasm && npm run compile
scripts.build: npm run build:cpp && npm run build:ts
scripts.copy-wasm: mkdir -p dist && cp cpp/lammps.wasm dist/ && cp cpp/lammps.mjs dist/

author: Atomify Team
